body_html:
Alex,

Thank you for all this information.

I am new in this area. To me, you are the first one land on the moon in this area, I am still on the earth, and pulling my hair to get this Tensorflow working on RHEL6, hoping some day I can land on the moon just like you did.

Can you do me a favor? I know you had listed your local customized files which modified by you in previously email chain, could you please sent all the your local customized files (Bazel and Tensorflow) which modified by you to me directly, my email is lucy_itjob@comcat.net. could you please include Crosstool files for current and previous version (give me the current version name and download url) too ? So that I can use the code to compare my environment based on your files.

You know, to be able to walk on the moon, it is not easy since there are no Tensorflow vendor support on RHEL6.

Alex, I attach an picture for you to enjoy! Thanks a lot
body_text:
Alex,
Thank you for all this information.
I am new in this area. To me,  you are the first one land on the moon in this area,  I am still on the earth, and pulling my hair to get this Tensorflow  working on RHEL6, hoping some day I can land on the moon just like you did.
Can you do me a favor? I know you had listed your local customized files which modified by  you in  previously email chain,  could you please sent all the your local customized files (Bazel and Tensorflow) which modified by  you to me directly, my email is  lucy_itjob@comcat.net. could you please include  Crosstool files for  current and previous version (give me the current version name and download url) too ?  So that I can use the code to compare my environment based on your files.
You know, to be able to walk on the moon, it is not easy since there are no Tensorflow vendor support on RHEL6.
Alex,  I attach an picture for you to enjoy! Thanks a lot
body:
Alex,

Thank you for all this information.

I am new in this area. To me,  you are the first one land on the moon in this area,  I am still on the earth, and pulling my hair to get this Tensorflow  working on RHEL6, hoping some day I can land on the moon just like you did.


Can you do me a favor? I know you had listed your local customized files which modified by  you in  previously email chain,  could you please sent all the your local customized files (Bazel and Tensorflow) which modified by  you to me directly, my email is  lucy_itjob@comcat.net. could you please include  Crosstool files for  current and previous version (give me the current version name and download url) too ?  So that I can use the code to compare my environment based on your files.

You know, to be able to walk on the moon, it is not easy since there are no Tensorflow vendor support on RHEL6.  

Alex,  I attach an picture for you to enjoy! Thanks a lot
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25250352/36062221-4b206a64-0e2d-11e8-87bc-ec48874097a9.png)
